attributes.action: Stricter sentences for people who cause death by drunk/dangerous driving
attributes.additional_details:
The driver of the car also left the scene  and failed to report what had happend as did the 5 other people in the car!
Please go to our facebook page 'sarahs story to read the full story' and see in more detail why we believe the law needs to be changed!!
attributes.background: Our dear freind sarah redfern was killed by a drunk driver last year who only recieved 9 years and out of that will only serve 4 and half...its disgracefull that somebody can take a life in such a awful way and be out enjoying there own life again in a few years ! We need the law changing now!!
